element.style { ()

[expanded] 
#box { (<style>…</style>)
    color: white;
    background: red;

[expanded] 
div { (<style>…</style>)
    border: 1px solid black;
/-- overloaded --/     background-color: white;
    padding: 20px;

[expanded] 
div { (user agent stylesheet)
    display: block;
